title: How to Make Brown Bread Using a Bread Machine

steps.headline: Add 1 1/2 teaspoons of yeast powder (sold in most supermarkets)
Set bread-machine program to basic and weight of 490[grams], 0.490[kg] (3 hours approx.)
Once the machine has been mixing for a while scrape flour of the edges and add extra flour or water if needed.

text: Add 1 lukewarm cup of water  Add 1 teaspoon of salt  Add 1 cup of normal flour  Add 3 teaspoons of sugar  Add 1 1/2 teaspoons of yeast powder (sold in most supermarkets)  Add 2 cups of integral flour  Add 3 tablespoons of vegetable oil  Set bread-machine program to basic and weight of 490[grams], 0.490[kg] (3 hours approx.)  Once the machine has been mixing for a while scrape flour of the edges and add extra flour or water if needed.
